scripts.docs:all: npm run docs:api && npm run docs:app
scripts.test:api:setup: docker rm --force team18_db_test && docker rm --force team18_api && rimraf db/data_test && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
scripts.test:api:mocha: docker exec -it team18_api npm run test
scripts.test:api: npm run test:api:setup && delay 15 && npm run test:api:mocha
